net.joala.net

Class EmbeddedWebservice

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.joala.net.EmbeddedWebservice

  • public class EmbeddedWebservice
extends Object

    An webservice meant to be used in tests to simulate a HTTP Server. You can feed it with prepared responses which will then be sent on each request.

    Since:
    10/4/12

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmbeddedWebservice()
      Creates a webservice responding to a random free port on root context.
      EmbeddedWebservice(String context)
      Creates a webservice responding to a random free port on specified context.
      EmbeddedWebservice(String context, int port)
      Creates a webservice responding to given port on specified context.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      Get the URI which where to send requests to, to reach this service.

      Get handler to control response flow.
      void start()
      Start the webservice.
      void stop()
      Stop the webservice.

      • EmbeddedWebservice

        public EmbeddedWebservice(@Nonnull
                  String context)
                   throws IOException

        Creates a webservice responding to a random free port on specified context.

        Parameters:
        context - context, for example /lorem for lorem-context
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure

      • EmbeddedWebservice

        public EmbeddedWebservice(@Nonnull
                  String context,
                  int port)
                   throws IOException

        Creates a webservice responding to given port on specified context.

        Parameters:
        context - context, for example /lorem for lorem-context
        port - port to bind the service to
        Throws:
        IOException - on failure
